job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: ltstronggtltugtabout usltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtat wework we provide inspiring and flexible workplace solutions to help businesses small medium or large thrive in more than cities globally the future of work is happening right now and we are leading this moment united by a common purpose here we will empower tomorrows world at work join us on our journey as we give our members the freedom and support to push boundaries in their industries and work to redefine our ownltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtabout the opportunityltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtwework is hiring an experienced fullstack software engineer to build and maintain our internal and memberfacing applications hundreds of thousands of members around the world rely on these applications to book spaces at wework locations get support learn about and gain entry to their building invite guests and work efficiently while in our spaces wework is adapting to the realities of covid and seeking to support new members and new flexibility in coworking space and our technology must rapidly adapt to support the business this role will be working on an established team of experienced engineers responsible for multiple applications and will have a direct impact on executive level initiativesltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtin this role you willltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligtenjoy continuous learning in a fast pace product driven environmentltligtltligtenjoy systems designing through leading designs of major software components systems and features owned by the teamltligtltligtable to utilize design coding patterns tools and frameworks and methods to facilitate in effectively meeting the team sprint objectives and the overall quarterly team objectivesltligtltligtcan drive feature development endtoend and deliver large projects at quarterly levelltligtltligteager to align correlated systems across squads on common api patterns practices or other instrumentationltligtltligtcomfortable partnering with product design and peer engineers and managers to influence beyond functional boundaries such as with product on technical feasibility and roadmap or with tooling and execution needsltbrgtltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtltugtabout youltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligtbachelor degree in computer science and years of experience building backend systems and web applications or years of experience building backend systems and web applicationsltligtltulgtltulgtltligtstrong experience using single pages application technologies react typescript is a plus and css extensions sass or lessltligtltulgtltulgtltligtdesigned and developed backend services using nodejs typescript or ruby on rails supporting frontend clientsltligtltligtcomfortable with aws postgresql docker circleci and githubltligtltulgtltulgtltligtdemonstrated architecture skills at a multisystem level and writing scalable efficient and clean codeltligtltulgtltulgtltligtenjoy working in an agile development environment and taking initiatives in improving systems for the sake of your teammates and our usersltbrgtltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtltstronggtlife at weworkltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltstronggtbeing a weworker is more than just a job we believe the magic of work is sparked by the passion you bring the places you go the people you meet and the purpose you follow and it starts here here you will brush shoulders with those who dare to dream and do here you will be welcomed by a diverse community that embraces and inspires youbecause together we can achieve more here we challenge ideas and explore new ways of getting things done whether you are part of our ltugtemployee community groupsltugt or part of a global project we ask you to bring your openminded attitude and collaborative spirit in return you will be part of a team where your unique perspectives are celebratedltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltstronggtwework is proud to be an equal employment opportunity and affirmative action
